Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Plenty of snow in woods and on golf course, woods was nicer, less wind. Trail was soft, easy climbing but not much speed on downhills. Only classic tracks were skier produced; it would be nice if the foot traffic would stop walking in the ski tracks.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Once the crew at Huron Meadows rolled the trails, it was a little on the soft side but much better than the half a foot of fresh snow that Mike made me ski in on the contractors loop.  Conditions should firm up and be quite good the next few days if you can brave the cold!  Thanks HM crew!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob red and blue loop has 18” of hard packed base . Looks like we will be skiing late into the Spring!

nubsNob.nightSkiing: No night skiing tonight. Night ski will resume on Saturday.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold day at Nub's Nob. The high temperature is forecast to be around 4 degrees today with a biting windchill, please dress appropriately for the conditions. Due to the forecasted windchill we will ski from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. with no night skiing. The slopes are expertly groomed today with quality snow. Expect slow snow today as the cold temperatures create more friction on ski bases. The soup of the day is clam chowder. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and espresso bar. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
